attributes.action: focus on the children's rights in the debate about gay couples as adopters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The best interests of most children are served by having a normal childhood and upbringing, provided by a father and a mother. That is what agencies providing substitute care for children in need should be aiming for. The children's rights should prevail and be properly represented. Many/most of the children are below the age or stage of being able to make informed decisions about their futures.
